message: Generated 5 behavioral therapy questions covering: (1) core behavioral assumption that behaviors ARE the problem (tricky conceptual), (2) flooding vs systematic desensitization application with time constraint, (3) conditioning mechanisms matching exercise, (4) aversion therapy classical conditioning mechanism, (5) token economy failure due to delayed reinforcement (tricky operational principle violation)

quality_features: All questions require deep understanding, not memorization
Application questions use realistic clinical scenarios
Detailed explanations for both correct and incorrect options
Questions distinguish behavioral from cognitive/psychodynamic approaches
